content: "Goats Head Soup" is another fantastic album by The Rolling Stones. It incorporates more funk and soul elements into their sound while still retaining their trademark rock and blues roots. The album features classic songs like "Angie," "Doo Doo Doo Doo Doo (Heartbreaker)," and "Star Star" that showcase the band's ability to evolve and explore new musical styles. Its groovy, funky vibes make "Goats Head Soup" an enjoyable album to listen to, and it shows how The Rolling Stones continued to adapt to the changing musical landscape during the 1970s.
